author: Mark Twain
quote: God created war so that Americans would learn geography.

author: Oscar Wilde
quote: I think God, in creating man, somewhat overestimated his ability.

author: Mahatma Gandhi
quote: God has no religion.

author: Nicolas Chamfort
quote: The most wasted of all days is one without laughter.

author: Rumi
quote: silence is the language of god, all else is poor translation.

author: Albert Einstein
quote: Black holes are where God divided by zero.

author: Sylvia Plath
quote: I talk to God but the sky is empty.

author: Woody Allen
quote: To you, I'm an atheist.To God, I'm the loyal opposition.

author: Mother Teresa
quote: God doesn't require us to succeed, he only requires that you try.

author: Friedrich Nietzsche
quote: I would believe only in a God that knows how to dance.

author: Woody Allen
quote: If you want to make God laugh, tell him about your plans.

author: Carl Sandburg
quote: A baby is God's opinion that the world should go on.

author: Woody Allen
quote: God is silent. Now if only man would shut up.

author: Fyodor Dostoyevsky
quote: To love someone means to see them as God intended them.

author: J.M. Barrie
quote: God gave us memory so that we might have roses in December.

author: Pierre Teilhard de Chardin
quote: Joy is the infallible sign of the presence of God.

author: Aristotle
quote: Whosoever is delighted in solitude, is either a wild beast or a god.

author: Voltaire
quote: God is a circle whose center is everywhere and circumference nowhere.

author: Abraham Lincoln
quote: No man is poor who has a Godly mother.

author: Joel Osteen
quote: Quit questioning God and start trusting Him!

author: G.K. Chesterton
quote: If there were no God, there would be no atheists.

author: Tom Waits
quote: There ain't no devil, only God when he's drunk.

author: Joyce Meyer
quote: Put your expectations on God, not on people.

author: John Lennon
quote: God is a concept by which we measure our pain.

author: Carolyn McCulley
quote: Men trust God by risking rejection. Women trust God by waiting.

author: Albert Einstein
quote: When the solution is simple, God is answering.

author: Tom Hiddleston
quote: Loki'd!

author: Stephen King
quote: God is cruel. Sometimes he makes you live.

author: Albert Einstein
quote: I want to know God's thoughts - the rest are mere details.

author: Charles Swindoll
quote: Anything under God's control is never out of control.

author: Voltaire
quote: If God did not exist, it would be necessary to invent him.

author: Corrie Ten Boom
quote: Is prayer your steering wheel or your spare tire?

author: Ben Carson
quote: Do your best and let God do the rest.

author: George Bernard Shaw
quote: I’m an atheist and I thank God for it.

author: Hans Christian Andersen
quote: Every man's life is a fairy tale, written by God's fingers.

author: Ntozake Shange
quote: i found god in myselfand i loved heri loved her fiercely

author: William Blake
quote: The glory of Christianity is to conquer by forgiveness.

author: Arthur Schopenhauer
quote: A sense of humour is the only divine quality of man

author: Joseph Campbell
quote: All the gods, all the heavens, all the hells, are within you.

author: Anna Nalick
quote: But, my God, it's so beautiful when the boy smiles

author: George S. Patton Jr.
quote: May God have mercy for my enemies because I won't.

author: Albert Einstein
quote: God is subtle but he is not malicious.

author: W.H. Auden
quote: Thank God for books as an alternative to conversation.

author: Frank Peretti
quote: You want proof there's a God? Look outside, watch a sunset.

author: George Carlin
quote: How can He be perfect? Everything He ever makes...dies.

author: Charles Spurgeon
quote: When your will is God's will, you will have your will.

author: Corrie Ten Boom
quote: Don't bother to give God instructions; just report for duty.

author: David Eddings
quote: God save us from religion.

author: Beyonce Knowles
quote: Thank God I found the GOOD in goodbye

author: Albert Einstein
quote: Dancers are the athletes of God.

author: Orson Welles
quote: I don't pray really, because I don't want to bore God.

author: Joyce Meyer
quote: Have God make a message out of your mess.

author: Walt Whitman
quote: In the faces of men and women, I see God.

author: Thomas S. Monson
quote: Remember who you are and what God expects you to become.

author: Fyodor Dostoevsky
quote: Without God all things are permitted.

author: Hafiz
quote: This place where you are right now,God circled on a map for you.

author: Johnny Cash
quote: My arms are too short to box with God.

author: Dietrich Bonhoeffer
quote: We must be ready to allow ourselves to be interrupted by God.

author: Kelly Clarkson
quote: God will never give you anything you can't handle, so don't stress.

author: Martin Luther
quote: Beer is made by men, wine by God.

author: Goethe
quote: If God had wanted me otherwise, He would have created me otherwise.

author: Nicholas Sparks
quote: I do not need a reason to be angry with God.

author: St. Augustine
quote: God provides the wind, Man must raise the sail.

author: C.S. Lewis
quote: I gave in, and admitted that God was God.

author: Thomas Merton
quote: Our idea of God tells us more about ourselves than about Him.

author: Albert Einstein
quote: Before God we are all equally wise - and equally foolish.

author: Neil DeGrasse Tyson
quote: God is an ever-receding pocket of﻿ scientific ignorance.

author: Ram Dass
quote: Treat everyone you meet like God in drag.

author: John Green
quote: God will punish the wicked. And before He does, we will.

author: Dietrich Bonhoeffer
quote: A God who let us prove his existence would be an idol

author: Joyce Meyer
quote: Don't let your feelings be a God to you.

author: John Green
quote: God I love rainbows.

author: Sean Penn
quote: When everything gets answered, it's fake.

author: A.W. Tozer
quote: Faith is the gaze of a soul upon a saving God.

author: Dante Alighieri
quote: Nature is the art of God.

author: Franz Kafka
quote: God gives the nuts, but he does not crack them.

author: Sylvia Plath
quote: I’ll never speak to God again.

author: Leonard Ravenhill
quote: A man who is intimate with God is not intimidated by man.

author: Hunter S. Thompson
quote: Pray to God, but row away from the rocks.

author: Joyce Meyer
quote: My purpose in life is to do right and to glorify God.

author: Nikola Tesla
quote: What one man calls God, another calls the laws of physics.

author: Francis Chan
quote: Has your relationship with God changed the way you live your life?

author: Socrates
quote: I pray Thee, O God, that I may be beautiful within.

author: Fred Rogers
quote: The kingdom of God is for the broken hearted

author: Elizabeth Gilbert
quote: God dwells within you, as you.

author: George Deacon
quote: If absolute power corrupts absolutely, where does that leave God?

author: Rumi
quote: Woman is the light of God.

author: Alice Walker
quote: Any God I ever found in church, I brought in myself.

author: Walt Whitman
quote: There is no God any more divine than Yourself.

author: Bill Cosby
quote: gray hair is gods graffiti

author: Leonardo Da Vinci
quote: God sells us all things at the price of labor.

author: Paramahansa Yogananda
quote: Read a little. Meditate more. Think of God all the time.

author: Joel Osteen
quote: If you can see the invisible, God will do the impossible.

author: Vanzant
quote: If you want to hear God laugh, tell Him your plans.

author: Michael Chabon
quote: Man makes plans . . . and God laughs.

author: W. Edwards Deming
quote: In God we trust; all others bring data.

author: Voltaire
quote: If God created us in his own image, we have more than reciprocated."(Notebooks)

author: Anonymous
quote: For GOD is greater than our hearts, and He knows everything.

author: Anonymous
quote: For GOD is greater than our hearts, and He knows everything.
